name: Carrot Hell
description:
It's like bullet hell except with carrots and extreme metal.

Controls

Left/A/Q - move left

Right/D - move right

Space/Z/Shift - jump

Up/W - up (menu, can be used to jump in-game)

Down/S - down (menu only)

Escape - quit to menu

Credits and Sources

I mostly used public domain assets in this project

  • Coding and concept by me!
  • Sound design by Mark Mauer (he makes cool game, check out his itch)
  • Background - Game_Assets_66
  • Classic Hero - GrafxKid 
  • Pop-up carrot - Sufan02 
  • Shooty carrots and bombs - ArlanTR
  • Ground tile - You're Perfect Studio
  • Explosions - Master484
  • High res carrot photography - Charles Deluvio
  • Music - ThE SoUnD oF cArRoTs by Ick Fx
  • Font (in the cover image) - Gypsy Curse by Chad Savage
